[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: ShellExec {
            parts: [
                Literal(
                    "Hello, ",
                ),
                Expression(
                    Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    3,
                                    10,
                                ),
                                name: "$name",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                ),
            ],
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                3,
                17,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
